item.title: Add or Update Image Column using Power Automate with image from the web
item.description: Add or Update Image Column using Power Automate The blog post Update image in SharePoint/Microsoft Lists Image columns using Power Automate by Ganesh Sanap explains how to update an image column in SharePoint or Microsoft Lists using Power Automate. According to the blog post, the native “Create Item” and “Update Item” actions in Power Automate do not directly support adding or updating image columns. Instead, Ganesh suggests using the “Send an HTTP Request to SharePoint” action to achieve this.
